replies.body: As a {{champion:107}} main..... What's an adc?

That jungle camp that has bugged AI.

It keeps wandering out of the jungle.
Oh. The one that hides under the tower all the time?
That's the one. You gotta keep farming it until its AI resets.
But it's not worth anything... Gromp gives me more gold
Oh I have a different bug. Mine is worth less than a mini raptor and is purple with wings.
As a {{champion:96}}  main, dadadadaDADADADAdadadadaDADADADAdaaaaaaaaaaaaaAAAAAAAAaaaaa.
http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/7/74/KogMaw.joke.ogg/revision/latest?cb=20121126170004

Lol I mean, I honestly like the way this is going, but I was basically just trying to say that every time someone starts a comment with this I roll my eyes. 

It's a pretty arrogant phrase, and it just sets a tone for the rest of whatever they say. 

But yeah, keep it going. 

I mean, I die a little every time I get a notification, but YOLO
As a {{champion:90}}  main, I swear, I am not broken, my ult can liteally be blocked be AN ITEM and, any cc also stops it.

As a {{champion:99}} main we tend to be pretty bright.

http://i.imgur.com/i3B3HIa.gif

Aggh! Wwee need ttoo have 4444 lett erss innn each word, rait? Oohh, godd, howw does this work????

Edit: This post made me look like a 5 year old, holy shit.

Wait, does Jhin realize "art" only has three letters?

Can we use "arte" instead for Jhin?
{{champion:202}} You mean it hasn't been spelled "arte" all this time?

Has it?  I clearly was not paying attention (not a Jhin main, despite having a fanfic with 4 parts, the fourth of which is a finale...)

Hey, why doesn't this thread have 4 upvotes, while we're speaking of Jhin?
You have 3 upvotes .... SOMEONE FIX THIS!!!!
Fixed!

Art = beautiful. Gems = beautiful.
That means art = gems = 4 letters.

It's only logic. ;)
Ah ... that makes sense.

>Edit: This post made ~~me~~ look like ~~a~~ **4** year ~~old~~, holy shit.

Sorry, just had to fix that. 

The best part is, if you remove all the words that are not 4 letters in that edit, you're still left with most of the sentence. xD
Only Four Word Also
Had to downvote in order for it to stay at 4...
